title: Definitions
context: [§346G-3] Definitions. As used in this chapter: &ldquo;Department&rdquo; means the department of human services. &ldquo;Fiscal year&rdquo; means a twelve-month period from July 1 of a particular calendar year to June 30 of the following calendar year, inclusive. &ldquo;Hospital&rdquo; means any facility licensed pursuant to chapter 11-93, Hawaii Administrative Rules. &ldquo;Inpatient care&rdquo; means the care of patients whose conditions require admission to a hospital. &ldquo;Net patient service revenue&rdquo; means gross revenue from inpatient and outpatient care provided to hospital patients converted to net patient revenue utilizing data from Worksheets G-2 and G-3 of each hospital&rsquo;s medicare cost report for fiscal year 2013-2014. If the hospital is new or did not file a fiscal year medicare cost report, the department shall obtain the hospital&rsquo;s net patient service revenue from the most recent period available. &ldquo;Outpatient care&rdquo; means all services furnished by hospitals to patients who are registered as hospital outpatients. &ldquo;Private hospital&rdquo; means those non-public hospitals named in attachment A of the medicaid section 1115 demonstration waiver that were in operation in calendar year 2015 and are currently operating or any hospitals not named in attachment A of the medicaid section 1115 demonstration waiver that became private hospitals in calendar year 2016 and are currently operating. &ldquo;Section 1115 waiver&rdquo; means the medicaid section 1115 demonstration waiver under which the state medicaid program is operating. [L 2012, c 217, pt of §2, §5; am L 2013, c 141, pt of §1, §2; am L 2014, c 123, §§1(1), 2; am L 2015, c 70, §§1(1), 2; am L 2016, c 60, §2(1)]
